pageTitle: Alaskan Guide Shirt - Extra Long | Filson
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {7483="We guarantee every item purchased from us. No more, no less. Your satisfaction is the sole purpose of our transaction." — Clinton C. Filson, 1897}
textBeforeTable: The Alaska Fit Extra Long Shirt represents classic Filson designs, in which garments are roomy and generously cut to accommodate heavy layering. Long shirts have 1-1/2" longer sleeves and 1-1/2" longer body length. Alaska Fit Extra Long 7-oz. cotton flannel Imported L, XL, 2XL, 3XL Machine wash Product Care Field; Workwear; Hunting; Shooting; Everyday Usage Medium-weight fabric is wind and abrasion resistant Cut extra long for added coverage Straight collar Adjustable button-closure cuffs 2 flap pockets Button-front closure Pleated back for ease of movement in shoulders, with hanging loop for license Features This durable, breathable shirt is made with medium-weight cotton that's brushed for comfort. It's cut for mobility and wind resistance, with adjustable cuffs, dual expandable pockets and a back hanging loop to display your license. textAfterTable: Filson shirts: In general order by your neck and sleeve measurements. If machine wash/line dry, allow for moderate shrinkage. *Measurements can vary by style, please contact customer service if you need specific details.
